Name: Idle Hamburgers Save the World
About the game: Game features 1. Click to produce hamburgers. At the same time, some technologies can be upgraded to produce more hamburgers per click. 2. Hire people of various professions to produce hamburgers. At the same time, you can unlock more classes. There are dozens of characters in the game. 3. It can produce different hamburgers. Unlock more advanced hamburgers to get more money. 4. Store system. Selling various props in stores can make production faster. 5. Rich achievement system.
